snippet: Income inequality has grown for decades in the United States, but by one measure it has accelerated during the Obama administration.
abstract: Anna Bernasek Datapoints column; income inequality has grown for decades in the United States, but the trend appears to have accelerated during the Obama administration; one measure of this is the relationship between median and average wages.
lead_paragraph: Income inequality has grown for decades in the United States, but by one measure it has accelerated during the Obama administration.
